name: Cthulhu Run
description:
CTHULHU RUN!

You don't need to outrun Cthulhu. You just need to outrun everyone else.

This game was created for the PIGSquad Summer Slow Jam (June 2019). The themes were "Arcade" and "Occult Classic". I was only able to spend the final day of the jam working on it, but I like the style and the mechanic so I'll probably polish it up.

Quick directions:

  • Use the left/right arrows to move
  • Collect purple boost power-ups
  • Use space or down arrow to boost
  • While boosting, knock over other people to prolong your boost
  • Don't get eaten
